sources.title: Love from a Stranger (1937) BASIL RATHBONEüçï ANN HARDINGüçï AGATHA CHRISTIE
sources.description:
üçïBased on a story by Agatha Christieüçï
Stars: Basil Rathbone, Ann Harding, Binnie Hale
Director: Rowland V. Lee

 After winning a fortune in a lottery, Cecily Harrington marries the charming but mysterious Bruce Lovell, played by Basil Rathbone. As they settle into an isolated countryside home, Cecily begins to uncover Bruce's dark and dangerous intentions. The film builds suspense through psychological tension, leading to a dramatic and unsettling climax.

metadata.Plot: A suave ladies man sweeps a working class girl, who has won a lottery, off her feet. She does not yet realize that he is a serial murderer.
metadata.Actors: Edna Best, Bernard Lee, Eileen Sharp
